column4: I'm trying to mount an ntfs volume, but I get "Cannot mount the volume | Unable to mount the volume". I've been able to previously mount this same HD once before in this same system. It's an external HD connecting via USB.
i haven't edited fstab yet if that's what you mean. i dunno what to put in
if is is USB you should not need to. Have you tried to mount it from the command line?
